title.en: The Useless Saint and the Cursed Holy Knight

altTitles.ja: 役立たず聖女と呪われた聖騎士
Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi "Omoidezukuri de Kokuhaku Shitara Kyuukon & Dekiai saremashita"
Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi
Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi "Omoidezukuri de Kokuhaku Shitara Kyuukon to Dekiai Saremashita"
役立たず聖女と呪われた聖騎士《思い出づくりで告白したら求婚＆溺愛されました》

altTitles.en: A Useless Saint and a Cursed Paladin "I Confessed to Make Memories but I Was Proposed to Instead"

description.en:
Annabel, a saint, carries healing abilities known as "Sacred Power". However, on an inopportune occasion, her Sacred Power is suddenly and completely reduced. The now-useless Annabel is forced into marriage and her livelihood brought to the cliff's edge. 

To make memories before her marriage, at a flower festival where anyone, regardless of social status can confess, she confesses her love to a knight who happens to pass by! Sometime later, Annabel, who is satisfied from her confession, and Lucas, the knight who she confessed to, reveal their desires to marry?! But it's to dispel a curse!
